sourceMeaningMnemonic: On your <radical>roof</radical> every <radical>evening</radical> you meet with <radical>snake</radical>s. All snakes know your <kanji>address</kanji>.
meaningInfo: You're snake famous. Snakes go on a pilgrimage to your address every evening. Your address is passed down from snake generation to snake generation.
readingMnemonic: The snakes come to your <kanji>address</kanji> every night to receive the greatest gift you can give a snake: <reading>a <ja>手</ja></reading> (<ja>あて</ja>).
readingInfo:
"You only give a <ja>手</ja> a night. Newcomers might have a <ja>手</ja> or two, but some snakes who have been coming to your address for years have hundreds of <ja>手</ja>s.

They are human hands."
